 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV increased based on MAX BRV

passives.name: Sensual Dance Extension
passives.desc:

 â€¢ Inflicted debuff duration +2
 â€¢ Slight boost to BRV granted to party based on MAX BRV

After using Sensual Dance:
 â€¢ HP Attack becomes HP Attack+ (slightly restores HP based on HP damage dealt; recovery limit: 10% of MAX HP) for 6 turns
